sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./styles/carousel.css" import CarouselSlide from "./CarouselSlide.jsx" export default class Carousel extends Component { render() { return(
  1. Go to last slide Go to next slide
  2. Go to previous slide Go to next slide
  3. Go to previous slide Go to next slide
  4. Go to previous slide Go to first slide
  1. Go to slide 1
  2. Go to slide 2
  3. Go to slide 3
  4. Go to slide 4
); } }
